ModMetaData.name: Less Rebuff
ModMetaData.author: Dingo and KapTaiN_KaVerN
ModMetaData.description:
Tweaks several mood penalties relating to romance. All penalties can only stack once.
* Failed romance attempt incurs -5 mood and lasts for 4 days. * Break-up incurs -15 mood and lasts for 25 days. * Cheating incurs -15 mood and lasts for 25 days. * Divorce incurs -20 mood and lasts for 30 days. * Rejected marriage incurs -18 mood and lasts for 30 days.
